thread.title: Vijay Raaz to debut in Mollywood
thread.title_full: Vijay Raaz to debut in Mollywood - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Vijay Raaz to debut in Mollywood
text:
Bollywood actor Vijay Raaz will make his debut in Malayalam film industry through Fahadh Faasil's Monsoon Mangoes.
Its director tells us that Vijay has a prominent role in the movie, which is shot extensively in New Orleans and Rajasthan. Raaz is known for his roles in films such as Delhi Belly , Monsoon Wedding and Dhamaal .
The movie's team is currently in Kochi gearing up for a Christmas release. Monsoon Mangoes also stars Tovino Thomas, Vinay Forrt and Ishwarya Menon.
